title: 跪求+哭求+各种求高手教写权限插件!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: 司马坑
txt_content:
本帖最后由 司马坑 于 2013-7-20 22:50 编辑 

RT    TAT不会写插件...........
帮我看看有什么错误。。。。。。。world的权限：
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  01:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - playerheads.canbehead
    - playerheads.canloosehead
    - playerheads.canbeheadmob        
    - automessage.receive.default
    - chairs.sit
    - stargate.use
    - iConomy.user        
    info:
      prefix: '&0[罪犯]&8'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  02:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - 01
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    - stargate.create
    - stargate.destroy
    - iConomy.user
    info:
      prefix: '&e[玩家]&b'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  03:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - 02
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    - playerheads.alwaysbehead
    - playerheads.alwaysbeheadmob
    - stargate.free        
    info:
      prefix: '&e[VIP]&6'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  04:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - 03
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    - stargate.admin        
    - coreprotect.*        
    - iConomy.plus
    - iConomy.accounts.*        
    info:
      prefix: '&e[城管]&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  05:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - -vanish.*
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&6[万能的腐竹]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
复制代码

replies.author: c601320218
replies.txt_content: 权限插件有GM，里面把权限写进去就可以了
